entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lincoln
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:44 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

Humidity: 69 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
